name: genkit
description: Firebase Genkit integration for building AI-powered applications with Claude, Gemini, and other AI models
author: Amit Patole

commands.name: genkit-init
commands.description: Initialize a new Firebase Genkit project with templates

commands.name: genkit-run
commands.description: Start the Genkit development server with UI

commands.name: genkit-deploy
commands.description: Deploy Genkit flows to production (Firebase/Cloud Run/Custom)

commands.name: genkit-flow
commands.description: Create a new Genkit flow from template

commands.name: genkit-doctor
commands.description: Check Genkit installation and project health

agents.name: genkit-assistant
agents.description: AI assistant specialized in Firebase Genkit development
